svg.script:
const quotes =[ { "quote": "I will embrace every pleasure and every pain this world has to offer.", "author": "Ainz Ooal Gown" }, { "quote": "Weakness disgusts me. Stand and rise, or be forgotten beneath our feet.", "author": "Demiurge" },
{ "quote": "If you win, you live. If you lose, you die. If you don’t fight, you can’t win!", "author": "Eren Yeager" }, { "quote": "The only thing we're allowed to believe is that we won't regret the choice we made.", "author": "Levi Ackerman" }, { "quote": "A soldier protects not himself, but the people depending on him.", "author": "Mikasa Ackerman" }, { "quote": "Devote your hearts!", "author": "Erwin Smith" }, { "quote": "This world is cruel, but it is also very beautiful.", "author": "Mikasa Ackerman" },
{ "quote": "If you don't take risks, you can't create a future.", "author": "Monkey D. Luffy" }, { "quote": "When do you think people die? When they are forgotten.", "author": "Dr. Hiriluk" }, { "quote": "Scars on the back are a swordsman’s shame.", "author": "Roronoa Zoro" }, { "quote": "Inherited Will, the destiny of an age, and the dreams of its people will not be stopped.", "author": "Gol D. Roger" }, { "quote": "A man's dream will never die.", "author": "Marshall D. Teach" },
{ "quote": "Go forward with your heart ablaze!", "author": "Kyojuro Rengoku" }, { "quote": "Set your heart ablaze. Don't ever forget that.", "author": "Kyojuro Rengoku" }, { "quote": "No matter how hard or painful it is, I will never give up.", "author": "Tanjiro Kamado" },
{ "quote": "Sometimes you have to hurt someone to stop them from hurting themselves.", "author": "Ken Kaneki" }, { "quote": "I'm not the protagonist of a novel or anything. I'm just a college student who likes to read.", "author": "Ken Kaneki" }, { "quote": "The world runs on power. Everything else is an illusion.", "author": "Arima Kishou" },
{ "quote": "If you're always worried about crushing the ants beneath you... you won’t be able to walk.", "author": "Guts" }, { "quote": "Dreams... how many people actually ever get to live their dreams?", "author": "Guts" }, { "quote": "You are now, and will forever be... my hawk.", "author": "Griffith" },
{ "quote": "I am Justice!", "author": "Light Yagami" }, { "quote": "Being alone is better than being with the wrong person.", "author": "L (Lawliet)" }, { "quote": "Humans are so interesting.", "author": "Ryuk" },
{ "quote": "People's lives don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith.", "author": "Naruto Uzumaki" }, { "quote": "Those who break the rules are scum, but those who abandon their friends are worse than scum.", "author": "Kakashi Hatake" }, { "quote": "Loneliness is the worst kind of pain.", "author": "Naruto Uzumaki" }, { "quote": "If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it.", "author": "Naruto Uzumaki" }, { "quote": "People cannot win against their loneliness.", "author": "Gaara" }, { "quote": "It is not wise to judge others based on your own preconceptions.", "author": "Itachi Uchiha" }, { "quote": "Pain will make you stronger.", "author": "Pain (Nagato)" }, { "quote": "Wake up to reality. Nothing ever goes as planned in this accursed world.", "author": "Madara Uchiha" },
{ "quote": "Be water, my friend.", "author": "Bruce Lee" }, { "quote": "You must understand that there is more than one path to the top of the mountain.", "author": "Miyamoto Musashi" }, { "quote": "The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.", "author": "Steve Jobs" }, { "quote": "He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.", "author": "Nietzsche" }, { "quote": "The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.", "author": "Marcus Aurelius" } ]
function updateQuote() { const quoteElement = document.getElementById("quote"); const random = quotes[Math.floor(Math.random() * quotes.length)]; quoteElement.textContent = random; }
setInterval(updateQuote, 5000); updateQuote();
